resources.string:
\ Adatronics was founded on April 1st, 2014. 

 We created it because we love hardware design and software development for wearable computing. We are dedicated to bringing the latest in wearable sensing, bluetooth low energy and opensource hardware to all developers. 

 All team members in Adatronics are graduate students from Northeastern University. We provide services on PCB design, system prototyping, firmware and Android application development.
